<JD_START>
Job Title: Country Club Executive Chef

Location: Matthews, NC

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
To Apply for this Job Click Here

This position is in the Beautiful Northern Mountains of North Carolina.

We are looking for an energetic Executive Chef for our beautiful Country Club! The ideal candidate will have a background in a club setting with members.

This is a single club managed internally and will require a chef that can come in and hit the ground running.

In a club setting, we need someone humble enough to handle feedback from members and also the personality to get to know them and impress them with consistent food! If this sounds like you, please apply today!

Executive Chef Requirements

Must be willing to relocate to Northern North CarolinaMust have recent Country Club experienceAbility to work in a club setting with members.Humble personality. No big egos.At least 3 years as an Executive Chef in a country club setting.Solid knowledge of food cost control.Self-starter mentality. There is no culinary manager above this position and someone who can learn the menu and execute it consistently is required.The ability to be creative and make frequent menu changes.

Executive Chef Benefits

Attractive compensation package.Health and 401K (Employer pays 60% of insurance for the employee)Tons of creative freedom in this position.

At Goodwin Recruiting we are committed to our core values. We take our value, Dedicated to Diversity & Inclusion, very seriously and will never discriminate against a candidate or client based on any protected classes. Our clients seek qualified candidates, and that is what we deliver. A person's age, gender, race, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, veteran or disability status, or arrest or conviction record has no bearing on whether he, she, or they are able to do the job. We evaluate the knowledge, skills, and abilities that meet the requirements of the position and aim to open doors and change lives. We value all people, understanding that uniqueness and diversity foster a stronger team that is innovative and brings varying perspectives to the table. We put our money where our mouth is and are proud of our efforts to identify a broad slate of candidates, with many hiring success stories to share. JOB ID: 134814 #post

Jesse Colton

To Apply for this Job Click Here

, $90,000 - $95,000,

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
